title: BTS album total sales in South Korea 2013 to 2017
yAxis: Number of sold albums in thousand copies
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of sold albums in thousand copies, containing a total of 5 data points.
Overall Number of sold albums in thousand copies has increased over the Year.
Number of sold albums in thousand copies is slightly increasing from 2013 to 2015, and finally roughly constant from 2015 to 2017.
The highest Number of sold albums in thousand copies, of value 2723.0 was reached at Year 2017
The lowest Number of sold albums in thousand copies, of value 58.0 was reported at Year 2013

max_summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of sold albums in thousand copies, containing a total of 5 data points.
In general Number of sold albums in thousand copies has rose over the Year.
Number of sold albums in thousand copies is slightly increasing from 2013 to 2015, and finally roughly constant from 2015 to 2017.

The line significantly increased by 160.0 from Year 2013 to 2014,increased by 345.0 from Year 2014 to 2015,increased by 896.0 from Year 2015 to 2016, and lastly, remained stable by 1264.0 from Year 2016 to 2017.
